resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156740</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2886</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Road Safety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sécurité routière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurança De Estrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sicurezza stradale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδική ασφάλεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguridad De Camino</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan aimed a teaching road safety through an activity where students collect information about road safety and prepare a poster and make an oral presentation of their findings.Includes assessment rubrics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">road safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan zielte eine unterrichtende 
Verkehrssicherheit durch eine Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer 
Informationen über Verkehrssicherheit sammeln und ein Plakat 
vorbereiten und eine Munddarstellung von ihren findings.Includes 
Einschätzung Rubriken bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon a visé une sécurité routière
d'enseignement par une activité où les étudiants rassemblent des 
informations sur la sécurité routière et préparent une affiche et 
font une présentation orale de leurs rubriques d'évaluation de 
findings.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição apontou uma segurança de 
estrada ensinando com uma atividade onde os estudantes coletassem a 
informação sobre a segurança de estrada e preparassem um poster e 
fizessem uma apresentação oral de seus rubrics da avaliação de 
findings.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione ha mirato una sicurezza 
stradale d'istruzione con un'attività dove gli allievi raccolgono le 
informazioni su sicurezza stradale e preparano un manifesto e fanno 
una presentazione orale delle loro rubriche di valutazione di 
findings.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος στόχευσε μια οδική ασφάλεια 
διδασκαλίας μέσω μιας δραστηριότητας όπου οι σπουδαστές 
συλλέγουν τις πληροφορίες για την οδική ασφάλεια και 
προετοιμάζουν μια αφίσα και παρουσιάζουν προφορική των 
συμπερασμάτων τους περιλαμβάνουν τις ρουμπρίκες αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección apuntó una seguridad de 
camino de enseñanza con una actividad donde los estudiantes recogen 
la información sobre seguridad de camino y preparan un cartel y hacen
una presentación oral de sus rúbricas del gravamen de 
findings.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sécurité routière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segurança de estrada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sicurezza stradale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οδική ασφάλεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">seguridad de camino</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
